name: USelfUnionMeshesToolProperties
doc: Standard properties of the self-union operation

bTrimFlaps: If true, remove open, visible geometry
bTryFixHoles: Try to fill holes created by the merge, e.g. due to numerical errors
bTryCollapseEdges: Try to collapse extra edges created by the merge
WindingThreshold: Threshold to determine whether a triangle in one mesh is inside or outside of the other
bShowNewBoundaryEdges: Show boundary edges created by the merge (often due to numerical error)
bOnlyUseFirstMeshMaterials: If true, only the first mesh will keep its materials assignments; all other triangles will be assigned material 0
